com.github.makiftutuncu.shoppingcart

Class Coupon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.makiftutuncu.shoppingcart.Coupon

  • public class Coupon
extends java.lang.Object
    Coupon is a way to make discounts on the ShoppingCart itself. It is valid for a specific minimum cart amount. Coupon discounts are either fixed amounts or rates, see DiscountType

    • Method Detail

      • ofAmount

        public static Coupon ofAmount(int minimumAmount,
                              int amount)
        Creates an amount-based coupon
        Parameters:
        minimumAmount - Minimum cart amount for the coupon, must be positive
        amount - Amount of discount of the coupon, must be positive
        Returns:
        Created coupon

      • ofRate

        public static Coupon ofRate(int minimumAmount,
                            double rate)
        Creates a rate-based coupon
        Parameters:
        minimumAmount - Minimum cart amount for the coupon, must be positive
        rate - Rate of discount of the coupon, must be in (0, 1)
        Returns:
        Created coupon

        public int minimumAmount()
        Returns:
        Minimum amount of the coupon

      • discountFor

        public int discountFor(int cartAmount)
        Calculates the discount amount to be applied
        Parameters:
        cartAmount - Amount of the cart
        Returns:
        Calculated amount or 0 if there won't be a discount
